attribute.name: Affection
attribute.description: How good are you at forming bonds with your master and the other maids?

attribute.name: Skill
attribute.description: How good are you at your maid duties?

attribute.name: Cunning
attribute.description: How capable are you at tricking enemies and other maids, and deceiving the master?

attribute.name: Will
attribute.description: How positive and constructive is your thinking?
